description:
* Based on an isekai fantasy light novel series written by http://anidb.net/cr69235 [Eguchi Ren] and illustrated by http://anidb.net/cr68155 [Masa].
http://anidb.net/ch127312 [Mukouda Tsuyoshi] was nothing special in modern Japan, so when he was summoned to a world of swordplay and sorcery, he thought he was ready for the adventure of a lifetime. Too bad the kingdom that summoned him only got him by mistake! Not only was he not one of the three summoned heroes, but his stats were laughable compared to theirs. On top of that, there`s something really sketchy about this kingdom... "Ah, these people are the kind to try and use the Hero," he realized, and immediately left to make his own way in this other world. The only thing Mukouda can rely on is his unique skill: the "Online Supermarket," a skill that allows him to buy modern goods in a fantasy world. It`s useless for combat, but if he plays his cards right, he could lead a comfortable life, maybe? At least, that`s what Mukouda thinks, but it turns out modern food bought with this skill has some absurd effects! What happens when Mukouda introduces ridiculously tasty modern cooking to a fantasy world like this? He gets some ridiculous repeat customers begging for more...!
Source: J-Novel
Note: The first two episodes received an early screening at a special event on December 26, 2022 at Shinjuku Wald 9 in Tokyo. The regular TV broadcast started on January 10, 2023.

REGULAR.description:
One day, Mukouda Tsuyoshi, an extremely ordinary salaryman, gets caught up in a hero summons being performed in another world. At the time of his summoning, he receives a unique skill known as "Online Grocery", that allows him to bring food ingredients and seasonings from his original world. Even though this skill seems plain at first glance, the food he brings into this new world has an absurd effect...!?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: My Absurd Skill Is Unexpectedly Useful
Tondemo Skill wa Yaku ni Tatsu
Un skill étonnamment utile
とんでもスキルは役に立つ

REGULAR.description:
After the legendary wolf monster Fenrir got attracted to the delicious smell of Mukohda’s food and signed the Familiar Contract with him, Mukohda decides to register with the Guild in Fallières his next stop. Mukohda parts ways with the Iron Will party and finally heads towards Fallières`s Guild, when...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Medatsu Juuma wa Ikiru Densetsu
The Salient Familiar Is a Living Legend
Un familier peu discret et divin
目立つ従魔は生きる伝説

REGULAR.description:
After registering with both the Merchant`s and the Adventurer`s Guilds, Mukohda immediately decides to take on a beginner’s quest. However, when they deliver the monsters that Fel caught during their quest to the Guild, they find out that most of these monsters are B-rank or higher.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ma puissance au service de mes repas
My Superpower Is All About Cooking
Sugita Chikara wa Ryouri no Tame ni
過ぎた力は料理の為に

REGULAR.description:
Mukohda asks Fel to teach him how to use magic after witnessing his wind magic. However, when things do not seem to go well, Fel decides to start a Spartan training regimen for him.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Cannot Start the Journey Without a Map
Chizu ga Nakute wa Hajimaranai
Dur de se repérer sans carte
地図が無くては始まらない

REGULAR.description:
Mukohda and Fel arrive at a large lake, where they catch some fish and have their usual meal. But right when they start eating inside the barrier that keeps monsters at bay, a baby slime appears out of nowhere...?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kaze no Megami wa Kanmi ga Osuki
La déesse du vent aime bien manger
The Goddess of Wind Has a Sweet Tooth
風の女神は甘味がお好き

REGULAR.description:
The place Fel decides to bring Mukohda to get some battle experience ends up being a creepy dungeon. Even so, Mukohda gets ready for battle and increases his stats by eating a meal from his original world using the “Online Grocery”. However...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Growth Happens out of Nowhere
Seichou wa Totsuzen Yatte Kuru
Une croissance rapide
成長は突然やってくる

REGULAR.description:
Mukohda and his familiars dash through the forest, after strengthening their bonds in the dungeon.
However, they soon find themselves in the territory of dangerous monsters and, just like Mukohda expected, surrounded by a pack of orthros...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le loup qui dansait avec les bêtes
Ookami wa Majuu to Odoru
The Wolf Dances with Monsters
狼は魔獣と踊る

REGULAR.description:
After Mukohda rescues a traveling caravan from a band of bandits, they set out together for the great city of Karelina. But when Mukohda visits the Adventurer’s Guild in the city, he gets notified that his membership was revoked...?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: All of the Boss Monsters Are Tasty
Boss Chara wa Dore mo Umai
Tous les boss sont bons
ボスキャラはどれも美味い

REGULAR.description:
Mukohda gets summoned by the guild master after defeating an entire settlement of goblins while finishing a guild request. Although Mukohda didn`t want to make a big deal out of it, he receives a high-ranking quest directly from the guild master...?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hunting Quests Are All About Meat and Money
Toubatsu Irai wa Kane to Niku
Une quête, de l`argent et de la viande
討伐依頼は金と肉

REGULAR.description:
Mukohda and his familiars receive a request to head towards a mine and hunt down the metal lizard that inhabits it. Instead, they run into a rare mithril lizard. After Mukohda defeats the lizard, with the help of Fel and Sui, Fel turns his interest towards a different and tastier prey...?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Deux familiers, c`est de la triche
My Two Familiars Are Too Overpowered
Nihiki no Juuma wa Cheat ga Sugiru
二匹の従魔はチートが過ぎる

REGULAR.description:
Lambert consults Mukohda about a gift for his wife. When Mukohda suggests a certain product he purchased from the online grocery, it leads to an unexpected situation. Meanwhile, a pack of dangerous monsters, called wyverns, are approaching the town...?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Doing Business for the Missus
Shoubai wa Gofujin no Tame ni
Une échoppe pour ma femme
商売は御婦人の為に

REGULAR.description:
After easily defeating the pack of dangerous yet powerful wyverns, Mukohda and his familiars receive praise not only from the guild, but also from the entire town. Unfazed by the attention, Mukohda goes out to look for a certain thing that he`s always wanted to get in ever since he got summoned to this world.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Adventures Are as Countless as Varieties of Food
Bouken wa Shoku no Kazu Hodo
Une aventure par repas
冒険は食の数ほど
Episode S1
Housou Chokuzen Namahaishin & Senkou Joueikai
放送直前生配信&先行上映会
Opening
Ending

titles.title: Tondemo Skill de Isekai Hourou Meshi
Campfire Cooking in Another World with My Absurd Skills
Hero Skill - Achats en ligne
Готування просто неба з абсурдними здібностями
Кулинар со странными навыками в параллельном мире
とんでもスキルで異世界放浪メシ
拥有超常技能的异世界流浪美食家
tonsuki
